svt_i2c_slave_monitor_def_cov_callback Class Reference

Inheritance diagram for class svt_i2c_slave_monitor_def_cov_callback:

List of all members.

Detailed Description

This class is extended from the coverage data callback class. This class includes default cover groups.


Public Member Functions

function void  new ( svt_i2c_configuration cfg , string name = "svt_i2c_slave_monitor_def_cov_callback" )

Member CoverGroup Documentation

  covergroup
 svt_i2c_slave_monitor_def_cov_callback::ack_for_device_id_bytes

Covergroup : ack_for_device_id_bytes

Coverpoint :

  • ack_for_device_id_bytes : Captures the ack/nacl bit for each of the device id bytes sent by the slave
covergroup ack_for_device_id_bytes @ ( event_device_id_ack ) ;
     option.per_instance = 1;
    option.comment = "This group captures ACK/NACK on each of the device id bytes";
     ack_for_device_id_bytes : coverpoint ack_for_byte
    {
      bins ack_1st_device_id = {1};
      bins ack_2nd_device_id = {2};
      bins ack_3rd_device_id = {3};
      bins nack_1st_device_id = {4};
      bins nack_2nd_device_id = {5};
      bins nack_3rd_device_id = {6};
    }
  endgroup

  covergroup
 svt_i2c_slave_monitor_def_cov_callback::bit_level_addr_stretch

Covergroup : bit_level_addr_stretch

Coverpoint :

  • bit_level_addr_stretch : Captures the number of clock cycles for which slave stretches SCL after each bit in address phase
covergroup bit_level_addr_stretch @ ( xact_event ) ;
     option.per_instance = 1;
    option.comment = "This covergroup captures the number of clock cycles for which slave stretches SCL after each bit in address phase";
         bit_level_addr_stretch : coverpoint xact.clk_stretch_time_addr_byte
    {
      bins bit_level_addr_stretch_min_range = {[1:3000]};
      bins bit_level_addr_stretch_mid_range = {[3001:7000]};
      bins bit_level_addr_stretch_max_range = {[7001:$]};
    }
  endgroup

  covergroup
 svt_i2c_slave_monitor_def_cov_callback::bit_level_data_stretch

Covergroup : bit_level_data_stretch

Coverpoint :

  • bit_level_data_stretch : Captures the number of clock cycles for which slave stretches SCL after each bit in data phase
covergroup bit_level_data_stretch @ ( xact_event ) ;
     option.per_instance = 1;
    option.comment = "This covergroup captures the number of clock cycles for which slave stretches SCL after each bit in data phase";
     bit_level_data_stretch : coverpoint xact.clk_stretch_time_data_byte
    {
      bins bit_level_data_stretch_min_range = {[1:3000]};
      bins bit_level_data_stretch_mid_range = {[3001:7000]};
      bins bit_level_data_stretch_max_range = {[7001:$]};
    }
  endgroup

  covergroup
 svt_i2c_slave_monitor_def_cov_callback::byte_level_stretch

Covergroup : byte_level_stretch

Coverpoint :

  • byte_level_stretch : Captures the number of clock cycles for which slave stretches SCL after each data byte
covergroup byte_level_stretch @ ( xact_event ) ;
     option.per_instance = 1;
    option.comment = "This covergroup captures the number of clock cycles for which slave stretches SCL after each data byte";
     byte_level_stretch : coverpoint xact.clk_stretch_time_after_byte
    {
      bins byte_level_stretch_min_range = {[1:3000]};
      bins byte_level_stretch_mid_range = {[3001:7000]};
      bins byte_level_stretch_max_range = {[7001:$]};
    }
  endgroup

  covergroup
 svt_i2c_slave_monitor_def_cov_callback::nack_addr

Covergroup : nack_addr

Coverpoint :

  • nack_addr : Captures whether slave sends NACK in address phase
covergroup nack_addr @ ( xact_event ) ;
      option.per_instance = 1;
    option.comment = "This covergroup captures whether slave sends NACK in address phase";
     nack_addr : coverpoint xact.nack_addr
    {
      bins nack_addr_0 = {0};
      bins nack_addr_1 = {1};
    }
  endgroup

  covergroup
 svt_i2c_slave_monitor_def_cov_callback::nack_data

Covergroup : nack_data

Coverpoint :

  • nack_data : Captures whether slave sends NACK in data phase and for which data byte
covergroup nack_data @ ( xact_event ) ;
     option.per_instance = 1;
    option.comment = "This covergroup captures whether slave sends NACK in data phase and for which data byte";
         nack_data : coverpoint xact.nack_data
    {
      bins nack_data_min_range = {[1:15]};
      bins nack_data_mid_range = {[16:30]};
      bins nack_data_max_range = {[31:$]};
    }
  endgroup
